title: 10 Things I Loved in 2024: Betsy Welch
content:
Riding with friends, Bentonville's art scene, sweet sunglasses and women-designed socks, and the joy of nearly instant hot water all day long - here are a few of my favorite things from 2024.

Read the full article at 10 Things I Loved in 2024: Betsy Welch on Velo.
author: Betsy Welch
